alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hampshire, central Franklin and northwestern Hampden Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 215 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Becket, or 7 miles southeast of Pittsfield, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Amherst, Northampton, Deerfield, South Hadley, Easthampton, Belchertown, Montague, Granby, Hadley, Sunderland, Hatfield, Williamsburg, Huntington, Conway, Leverett, Shutesbury, Ashfield, Westhampton, Whately and Chester. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for western Massachusetts.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire
